amendment.description: Amendment allows the Forest Service to create a pilot program that would execute contracts with tribes to perform administrative, management, and other functions of programs of the Tribal Forest Protection Act of 2004.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-290 to allow the Forest Service to create a pilot program that would execute contracts with tribes to perform administrative, management, and other functions of programs of the Tribal Forest Protection Act of 2004.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
